actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that no amount shall be included in gross income by reason of the use of a police, fire, or emergency medical vehicle for commuting if the only permitted personal use of such vehicle is commuting.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that the use of law enforcement, fire protection, and emergency medical vehicles for commuting purposes shall be treated as a nontaxable fringe benefit if the only permitted personal use of such vehicles is commuting.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that no amount shall be included in gross income by reason of the use of a police, fire, or emergency medical vehicle for commuting if the only permitted personal use of such vehicle is commuting.
